item.description:
Wake up and head to Northwest Park this morning for the annual Friends of Northwest Park Pancake Breakfast from 8:00 AM to 11:00 AM in the Warming Shed. Bring an appetite for a full breakfast of pancakes and sausage smothered in 100% pure maple syrup made right at Windsorâ€™s very own Northwest Park. Refreshment choices include orange juice, coffee, tea and hot chocolate. $5.00 for adults and $3.00 for children under 6. Please RSVP so we know to look for you.

The intrepid among us may head out for a hike after to work off the pancakes!
item.name: Pancake Breakfast
